name: New Vehicle Design Request
description: Submit a request for designing a new vehicle model, including specifications and features.

name: Production Line Optimization
description: Request optimization of production lines to increase efficiency and reduce costs.

name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Installation
description: Submit a request for installation of electric vehicle charging stations at DriveCorp facilities.

name: Supply Chain Disruption Mitigation
description: Request assistance in mitigating supply chain disruptions affecting DriveCorp's operations.

name: Autonomous Vehicle Testing Request
description: Submit a request for testing and validation of autonomous vehicle features.

name: Sustainability Report Generation
description: Request generation of sustainability reports highlighting DriveCorp's environmental impact and progress towards carbon neutrality.

name: Dealer Network Expansion
description: Submit a request for expanding DriveCorp's dealer network in new markets or regions.

name: Vehicle Recalls and Updates
description: Request management of vehicle recalls and software updates for DriveCorp's fleet.

name: Digitalization Project Proposal
description: Submit a proposal for digitalization projects to improve DriveCorp's operational efficiency and customer experience.

name: Employee Training and Development
description: Request training and development programs for DriveCorp employees to enhance skills and knowledge in areas like electric mobility and autonomous driving.
